articles.title: Back to School Refresh with Swiffer
articles.summary: Swiffer offers three products for cleaning: the Swiffer Power Mop for quick cleaning, the Swiffer Sweep and Mop Deluxe which functions as both a sweeper and a mop while being compact, and the Swiffer Duster which extends to 6 feet. These products are available at most major retailers.

articles.title: Roborock Marks 11th Anniversary with Unbeatable Deals and a Glimpse into the Future of Cleaning  Aug. 18, 2025 22:01
articles.summary: Roborock is celebrating its 11th anniversary with a discount on its flagship model Saros Z70, priced at $1,599 (originally $2,599). The company also introduced the F25 Ultra steam-powered floor washer, available for pre-order at an exclusive price of $599 (MSRP $799) starting August 29th.

articles.title: Candid Mixers and PT Sukanda Djaya Announce Strategic Distribution Partnership
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Candid Mixers, an Indonesian premium mixer brand, partners with PT Sukanda Djaya for nationwide distribution of its products including Imperial Tonic, Club Soda, and Ginger Ale. Candid Mixers also launched Emma, an AI Bartender which suggests recipes for signature cocktails.

articles.title: 11 Tough Truck Upgrades That Are Pure Utility, Not Flash
articles.author: Suanne Hastings
articles.summary: Tommy Gate offers sealed hydraulics and the G2 model lift with 1,500-pound capacity. Rack N Ride MX turns trucks into bike haulers with a 370-pound capacity. Adapt Storage Case provides organized tool storage with a configurable Eltra system, while XT Freestyle improves ride quality with airbag or coil spring configurations. Drop Racks XL unfolds for safer loading, and Black Armour Mats protect truck beds. The Busy Dumper kit transforms pickups into hydraulic dump trucks with a 6,000-pound capacity. Ascender Camper provides a complete living space with kitchen, lounge, shower, and off-grid power systems.

articles.title: Candid Mixers and PT Sukanda Djaya Announce Strategic Distribution Partnership
articles.summary: Candid Mixers has partnered with PT Sukanda Djaya for nationwide distribution of its premium mixers, including Imperial Tonic, Club Soda, and Ginger Ale. Candid Mixers also launched Emma, an AI Bartender that suggests cocktail recipes and pairings.

articles.title: Candid Mixers and PT Sukanda Djaya Announce Strategic Distribution Partnership
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Candid Mixers, Indonesia's first homegrown premium mixer brand, is launching nationwide through a distribution agreement with PT Sukanda Djaya. The company also introduces Emma, an AI Bartender, designed to suggest cocktail recipes and pairings, enhancing the usability of Candid's premium mixers.

articles.title: Are You Ready For A Humanoid Robot To Assist In Household Chores?
articles.author: Tyler Durden
articles.summary: Weave Robotics, founded by former Apple engineers, is introducing 'Isaac,' a home robot capable of autonomously folding clothes and picking up objects. While initially hinted to be priced at over $10,000, 'Isaac' is now available for a refundable $1,000 reservation fee with the full purchase price at $59,000 or a payment plan of $1,385 per month for 48 months and is slated to begin shipping in the fall of 2025.

articles.title: Why Pipiads is the Top Choice for TikTok Ads Review in 2025
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: Pipiads is launched as an all-in-one platform to find the best ads and products on TikTok. It offers a comprehensive library of TikTok ads, trending products, and competitor strategies, along with tools like profit calculators and a Shopify detector. The platform offers different pricing plans, including a free trial and tiered subscriptions, to accommodate various user needs and budgets.

articles.title: Infiniti digs into back catalog to revive its fortunes
articles.author: 7NEWS Australia
articles.summary: Infiniti's new QX65 draws design inspiration from the FX model. However, the QX65 will not include a V8 engine or a rear-wheel drive platform, distinguishing it from its predecessor.

articles.title: Ukranian President meets with Trump to discuss end of war
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers the KENS 5 app. The app enables users to stream KENS 5 on their phones.

articles.title: Hundreds of gallons of chemicals inside industrial building erupt into flames, SAFD says
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers a streaming service accessible through the KENS 5 app on mobile phones.

articles.title: Nvidia's GeForce Now adds killer upgrades: RTX 5080, DIY game installs
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Nvidia is upgrading its GeForce Now Ultimate tier with GeForce RTX 5080 servers. The upgrade includes cinematic visual enhancements and a new 'install to play' service that downloads games directly to the cloud.

articles.title: The new $4 Woolworths bag solves a common supermarket gripe
articles.author: SHARON HUNT
articles.summary: Woolworths has launched the Click N Stay™ bag, a $4 reusable shopping bag designed to stay open at self-checkouts. Made from at least 90% recycled plastic, it features a unique locking mechanism and comes in three Australian icon-themed designs.

articles.title: The futuristic upgrade you didn't know you needed is now 30% off.
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: AI Smart Camera Recording Sunglasses have been launched, featuring a built-in 1080P HD camera, dual ENC microphones, and AI capabilities. These sunglasses can take calls, record videos, filter blue light, and integrate with a companion app for advanced AI tools and real-time voice or touch control. The glasses are currently offered at a discounted price of $69.99.

articles.title: Continental to Unveil New Large-Capacity GS Series Washers at Clean 2025 New 90- and 130-Pound Models Feature Revenue-Boosting Enhancements
articles.author: Continental Laundry Solutions
articles.summary: Continental Laundry Solutions will debut its latest Girbau Commercial GS Series soft-mount washers with the Genius Control, available in 90- and 130-pound capacities, at Clean 2025.

articles.title: Infiniti digs into back catalog to revive its fortunes
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Infiniti, Nissan's luxury brand, is introducing the QX65 Monograph "sportback SUV" concept. This new product aims to revive Infiniti's distinctive design and reverse declining sales. The QX65 Monograph will differentiate Infiniti from its parent brand.

articles.title: I tried all the supermarket cookie dough ice creams – winner is as luxurious as Haagen-Dazs but costs just £2.19
articles.author: Laura Stott
articles.summary: Haagen-Dazs increased the dough nibbles in its Cookies and Cream flavour by 80 per cent. Aldi offers Gianni's Monster Cookie Crunch, a bright blue ice cream with cookie chunks and marshmallow sauce. Lidl's Gelatelli Cookie Dough ice cream contains 16% cookie dough balls and chocolate chunks, while Tesco's Fully Loaded Choco Cookie Dough Ice Cream features 19% chocolate chip cookie dough pieces and chocolate sauce.

articles.title: 「GeForce NOW Ultimate」がGeForce RTX 5080クラスの性能に
articles.summary: NVIDIA's GeForce NOW, a cloud gaming service, was mentioned in a news announcement on August 18th. The announcement appears to discuss updates related to the cloud gaming service.

articles.title: Nvidia says Blackwell GPUs coming to GeForce Now cloud gaming service (NVDA:NASDAQ)
articles.author: Seeking Alpha
articles.summary: Nvidia is integrating its Blackwell line of GPUs into its GeForce Now cloud gaming service.

articles.title: NVIDIA's inept AI game assistant now works on more RTX hardware — should you be using it for PC gaming?
articles.author: Cale Hunt
articles.summary: NVIDIA has expanded its Project G-Assist, an on-device AI helper, to all RTX GPUs with 6GB or more VRAM. Available through an NVIDIA App update on August 19, the updated G-Assist includes a new, more efficient AI model and support for user-built plugins via a collaboration with mod.io.

articles.title: Nvidia announces the 'biggest launch in GeForce Now RTX history': RTX 5080 performance, local-style installs, better game streaming quality, and more
articles.author: Jacob Fox
articles.summary: Nvidia has announced significant upgrades to its GeForce Now service, including RTX 5080-level performance on the Ultimate subscription and a new Install-to-Play feature that expands the game library. Additionally, GeForce Now will receive visual enhancements through a new Cinematic Quality Streaming (CQS) mode, offering improved image quality and support for higher refresh rates.

articles.title: ‘Play Instantly on Discord': Fortnite will be Nvidia and Discord's first instant game demo
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Nvidia, Discord, and Epic Games are testing instant game demos for Discord servers. Users can try games like Fortnite within Discord without downloads or installs by connecting their Epic Games account. Nvidia presented this "technology announcement" at Gamescom.

articles.title: Cheaper Xbox Cloud Gaming? Microsoft Hints at New Plan!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft is planning to evolve Xbox Cloud Gaming (xCloud) by potentially offering a free, ad-supported tier to increase accessibility. The company is collaborating with AMD to develop dedicated hardware and integrate AI-powered rendering and gameplay features, which will be tested on the Xbox Ally X. The goal is to create a seamless and personalized gaming experience with cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: How AdComposer AI is redefining modern marketing
articles.author: Jon Stojan
articles.summary: AdComposer.ai has launched an AI-powered platform which generates custom ad creatives in seconds, based on performance data. The platform aims to provide accessible AI tools for businesses to create high-performing ads instantly.

articles.title: Popular chippy near Glasgow puts twist on viral M&S snack
articles.author: Ben Waddell
articles.summary: Hook and Catch Bearsden introduced a battered and deep-fried version of the Marks and Spencer's Strawberries and Cream Sandwich. The unique creation, inspired by the Japanese fruit sando, involves battering, deep-frying, and dusting the M&S sandwich with icing sugar. This new menu item is described as a fruity, crispy, and unnecessary guilty pleasure.

articles.title: Frizerly Emerges as the Best AI SEO Agent for Small Businesses, Shopify and WordPress Sites ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Frizerly, an AI-powered content marketing platform, has announced itself as the leading AI SEO agent. It's designed for small businesses, Shopify stores, and WordPress users, aiming to help businesses rank higher on Google through automated, SEO-optimized content creation.

articles.title: Psst — You Didn't Hear About These 34 Cheaper Versions Of Expensive Beauty Products From Me
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several beauty brands are introducing new products or affordable alternatives to existing expensive products. E.l.f. launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, an affordable version of Blinc mascara. L'Oreal Paris introduced Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist, compared to One/Size setting spray, and BB Cream as an alternative of Dr Jart+ Cicapair Color Correcting Cream. Catrice introduced 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener, and Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette, an alternative for Makeup Forever Palette.

articles.title: Argos £30 clothes airer dries three loads of laundry at once and saves loads of energy
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Argos offers the Addis 40m 4 Arm Rotary Outdoor Airer for £30, capable of holding three laundry loads. B&M is selling a Russell Hobbs handheld steamer for £25, which can remove creases from clothes and refresh fabrics.

articles.title: This mascara is a #1 best seller on Amazon and buyers say it's a 'game changer'
articles.author: Mtl Blog Trending Staff
articles.summary: Maybelline New York Lash Sensational Sky High Washable Mascara, priced at $11.99 on Amazon.ca, is receiving positive reviews for its lengthening and volumizing effects. The mascara features a buildable formula with bamboo extract and a flexible brush, and is available in multiple colors and versions, including waterproof and primer options.

articles.title: Volkswagen locks extra horsepower behind $20 monthly subscription
articles.author: Grant St. Clair
articles.summary: Volkswagen is introducing a subscription model for its Volkswagen ID.3 car, requiring customers to pay $20 monthly to unlock the full engine power, increasing net power by 27bhp and the maximum torque from 265Nm to 310Nm. This subscription model allows customers to access additional performance without committing to a higher initial purchase price.

articles.title: AliExpress Launches Back-to-School Sale With Dorm-Ready Deals
articles.summary: AliExpress is launching the #RoastMyCart challenge on Instagram, inviting students to share their AliExpress shopping carts for a chance to be roasted by the brand's social team. The campaign aims to engage students during the back-to-school season by showcasing a curated mix of budget-friendly tech, small-space solutions, and personality-packed finds to inspire shopping.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G96 review: Reliable mid-range phone with slim design
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Motorola is introducing the Moto G96 5G, featuring a 6.67-inch full HD+ OLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, and a dual-camera system with a 50MP main lens. The phone also has a 5,500mAh battery with 33W fast charging and runs on Android 15-based Hello UI.

articles.title: Mangabat Redefines Free Manga Reading with Unmatched Variety and Speed
articles.summary: Mangabat launched a platform that provides free, high-quality manga reading through its website, mangabats.com. The platform offers an expansive library across genres with rapid content updates, accessible on multiple devices, aiming to revolutionize how readers connect with manga. Mangabat provides access to an extensive collection of manga without cost, allowing readers to explore stories that spark their imagination.

articles.title: Turn every adventure into a highlight reel from your POV with these $70 smart recording sunglasses
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: StackCommerce is offering 1080P AI Smart Camera Recording Sunglasses for $69.99. These sunglasses feature a built-in 1080P HD camera for recording videos, dual ENC microphones with noise cancellation, 5GHz WiFi for wireless transfer and AI-powered features such as real-time language translation and ChatGPT access. They also have blue light filtering lenses and can automatically record short clips to preserve battery and storage.

articles.title: Preparing kids for school
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers its streaming service via the KENS 5 app, available on phones.

articles.title: Aldi launches new dinner set for one just in time for kids heading off to uni & it comes with 6 kitchen essentials
articles.author: Jordan Farrell
articles.summary: ALDI has launched a new 'Student Dinnerware Set' for £9.99. The set includes a dinner plate, bowl, side plate, mug, and cutlery. This product will be available starting August 28th as part of Aldi's Specialbuys collection.

articles.title: NexusTek Unveils New Website, Showcasing Innovation and Customer-Centric Services
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NexusTek launched its redesigned website, which offers a simplified user experience to explore their services. The website highlights newly introduced MDR, data modernization, and secure AI platform offerings. NexusTek aims to empower organizations by providing faster access to solutions and services.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 series launch knocks on the door: Check last-minute leaks of Pixel 10 series before August 20, 2025
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 10 series on August 20, 2025, featuring the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and the Pixel 10 Pro Fold. The launch will also include the Pixel Watch 4 and Pixel Buds 2a. The Pixel 10 series will come with updated storage, RAM, and battery capacities, as well as camera improvements across the models.

articles.title: NexusTek Unveils New Website, Showcasing Innovation and Customer-Centric Services
articles.author: Nexus Tek
articles.summary: NexusTek launched its redesigned website on August 18, 2025. The website aims to offer a new digital experience reflecting the company's focus on innovation-led solutions for complex business challenges in data, AI, cloud, and cybersecurity.

articles.title: Monzo considers launching mobile service to rival major phone networks
articles.author: Anna Wise
articles.summary: Monzo is exploring developing a new mobile contract service. The company is doing this in response to customer feedback about pain points with existing mobile contracts.

articles.title: Finalists announced for New Product & Packaging Awards 2025
articles.author: The Grocer
articles.summary: The Grocer New Product & Packaging Awards 2025 features finalists with innovative products like collagen chocolate milk and 3D-printed steak. Brands such as McVitie's, Hellmann's, and Doritos are competing, with winners to be announced on November 7th. The awards recognize cutting-edge new product and packaging launches in the food and drink sector.

articles.title: InboxAlly Launches $99 Startup Program for Early-Stage Businesses to Improve Email Deliverability
articles.summary: InboxAlly has launched a Startup Program that offers their entry-level plan for $99 per month to businesses less than two years old and generating under $2 million in annual revenue. This program aims to provide startups with world-class email performance and a competitive advantage, with integrations and easy setup.

articles.title: Monzo plans to launch UK mobile phone service
articles.author: The Observer
articles.summary: Monzo, a digital bank launched in 2015, is planning to introduce its own mobile phone service in the UK. This move aims to increase competition within the phone service market and generate additional revenue for the company.

articles.title: Sprouts Farmers Market to open 5th N.J. store in October
articles.author: N.J. News Report
articles.summary: Sprouts Farmers Market is opening a new store in Woodbridge, New Jersey, on October 3rd. The store will feature Sprouts' signature layout and offer a wide selection of organic, plant-based, gluten-free, and specialty products. Sprouts will host in-person hiring events to fill 107 jobs at the new location.

articles.title: Roborock Marks 11th Anniversary with Unbeatable Deals and a Glimpse into the Future of Cleaning
articles.summary: Roborock is offering a discount on its flagship Saros Z70 model and has also introduced the F25 Ultra, a steam-powered washer, for pre-order during its 11th-anniversary sale. LILYSILK has launched its first activewear line, the SILKERRY™ Collection, made from silk-enhanced terry fabric.

articles.title: Roborock Marks 11th Anniversary with Unbeatable Deals and a Glimpse into the Future of Cleaning
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Roborock is offering a discount on its Saros Z70 robot vacuum. The company has also introduced the F25 Ultra for pre-order.

articles.title: 24/7 concierge: Zoom's agentic AI and virtual agent now extends to Zoom Phone, helping ...
articles.author: Zoom Communications
articles.summary: Zoom Communications, Inc. has expanded Zoom Virtual Agent to Zoom Phone, introducing a new concierge use case for personalized support. Additionally, Zoom has launched Zoom Hub, a centralized workspace for managing Zoom files. AI Companion enhancements have also been introduced for agentic scheduling and Team Chat to improve productivity.

articles.title: 24/7 concierge: Zoom's agentic AI and virtual agent now extends to Zoom Phone, helping businesses capture more calls and opportunities
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Zoom Communications, Inc. launched Zoom Hub, a centralized content center. Zoom Virtual Agent now integrates with Zoom Phone, providing enhanced call support. AI features across Zoom Meetings and Team Chat have been improved to boost team productivity.

articles.title: Samsung's budget Galaxy Buds 3 FE are here
articles.author: Thomas Ricker
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Buds 3 FE, featuring a stemmed design, improved sound, enhanced active noise cancellation, and IP54 resistance. The Buds 3 FE promise up to 6 hours of listening with ANC on, and seamless access to Galaxy AI capabilities, available in black and gray models for $149.99 in the US on September 4th.

articles.title: quantilope Launches quantilabs: Exclusive Hub for Early Access to Product Innovations
articles.author: quantilope
articles.summary: quantilope launched quantilabs, an exclusive innovation hub. Clients can access and test quantilope's early-stage product developments within this hub before public release.

articles.title: Tradealgo Launches Mobile App For Real-Time Market Insights
articles.author: Trade Algo
articles.summary: TradeAlgo launched its new mobile app on Apple's App Store. The app provides investors with on-the-go access to TradeAlgo's core dashboard and AI-driven market insights. An Android version is pending approval on Google Play.

articles.title: 43 Products I Wish Everyone Knew About
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Nivea launched a lightweight gel cream with Q10. Hanni introduced Shave Pillow, a showerless shave gel. Mielle launched rosemary mint strengthening edge gel with biotin, coconut oil, and babassu oil.

articles.title: Montoddler Transforms Parent Shopping Experience with New Intelligent Service
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Montoddler, a premium early childhood brand, has launched a new AI-powered service platform. This upgrade has increased customer satisfaction from 82% to 96% in six months by delivering faster support, smarter deliveries, and products shaped by real customer feedback. The platform transforms the shopping experience for parents across the United States.

articles.title: Montoddler Transforms Parent Shopping Experience with New Intelligent Service
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Montoddler has launched a new AI-powered service platform that improves customer support, delivery speed, and product design based on customer feedback. The platform integrates the shopping journey, monitoring stock in real-time and optimizing delivery schedules, which led to on-time deliveries climbing to 98% and shipping issues reducing by nearly 50%.

articles.title: Fast food chain Wendy's (yes, the one with the square burger) is coming to Ireland this year
articles.author: Andrew Walsh
articles.summary: Wendy's will open a new restaurant in Cork, Ireland, this October, marking its first step in partnership with Corrib Oil. The restaurant will offer a range of items made with Irish beef and chicken, including breakfast wraps, nuggets, signature burgers, and Frosty desserts. A wider rollout is planned, with 10 Wendy's restaurants expected to open across Ireland between 2025 and 2027.

articles.title: These 36 Products Will Look So Pretty In Your Kitchen
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Our Place launched the Splendor Blender, designed for smoothies and shakes. Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day introduced "Daisy" Hand Soap. Cuisinart released a color-coded knife set, while Dash launched a mini rice cooker. Tupperware released a retro-inspired pitcher from Tupperware's Vintage Collection.

articles.title: Cents Demonstrates Next-Generation Laundry Technology Solutions at Clean Show 2025
articles.author: Cents
articles.summary: Cents will showcase breakthrough product innovations at Clean Show 2025, including enhancements to its AI-powered platform for laundry businesses. The company will also preview an upcoming memberships platform. Cents currently powers 1 in 7 laundromats across the United States.

articles.title: Can £6 Primark fragrances really rival £150 Byredo scents? I put them to the test
articles.author: Zoe Cripps
articles.summary: Primark has launched its new "PS... Pro summer collection" of six perfumes, priced at £6 each. The collection includes scents like Nomad Oasis and Electric Rose, which are comparable to Byredo's Rose of No Man's Land and Desert Dawn. While the Primark perfumes may not have the same depth and staying power as the Byredo fragrances, they offer a budget-friendly alternative.

articles.title: Signs reveal plans for popular North East restaurant opening in Stockton
articles.author: The Northern Echo
articles.summary: Manjaros is opening a new store on Prince Regent Street in Stockton. This indicates an expansion of Manjaros' service offerings to a new location.

articles.title: Content Guidelines Update for EEA and UK Customers: Yahoo! Japan's Transition from Virtual Assistant to Content Writer Services
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Yahoo! Japan is transitioning from virtual assistant services to focus on content writing for businesses in the EEA and UK. They are offering new content creation services including blog posts, website copy, social media content, product descriptions and marketing materials. They are also using AI-assisted writing to enhance content creation.

articles.title: Independence Day: Gojek empowers local tech talent in driving innovation for Indonesia
articles.author: Creative Desk
articles.summary: Gojek has introduced several new services and features, including GoCar Prestige, curated healthy menus on GoFood, faster delivery options such as GoFood Flash and GoMart 15-Minute Delivery, GoRide Instant, GoSend 1-Hour Delivery, and the environmentally friendly GoGreen SM. The company also launched the GoFood Merchant app to reduce onboarding time for new merchants.

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo and Joao Felix unveil Al-Nassr's new 'timeless' home kit for 2025-26 season
articles.author: Goal
articles.summary: Al-Nassr released their new home kit.

articles.title: This Teant Mattress Vacuum Is on Sale for $90 at Amazon
articles.author: Izzy Baskette
articles.summary: Teant introduced the Mattress Vacuum Cleaner, available on Amazon, designed to eliminate dust, allergens, and bacteria from mattresses and furniture. The vacuum utilizes Anion technology, UV-C light, heat, and aromatherapy. Amazon also offers Jphyll Mattress Vacuum Cleaner, Zarimi Portable Cordless Vacuum and Black and Decker Dustbuster AdvancedClean Vacuum.

articles.title: Cloth Drying Hanger – The Smarter Way To Dry
articles.summary: Cloth drying hangers offer a space-saving and convenient alternative to traditional drying methods, suitable for various home layouts with ceiling-mounted, wall-mounted, or floor-standing options. These hangers protect clothes from dust and wrinkles, enhance balcony aesthetics, and are made from durable materials like stainless steel for long-lasting use.

articles.title: Kellogg's release new cereal in UK and shoppers say it tastes like old classic
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Kellogg's has launched a new cereal, Kellogg's Smacks, in the UK. Shoppers are noting its similarity to the discontinued Sugar Puffs cereal, with many expressing excitement about the new Kellogg's product despite the comparison.

articles.title: This $14 Moisturizer Works Shockingly Well On My Acne-Prone Skin
articles.author: Shawna Hudson
articles.summary: Vanicream offers a sensitive skin-friendly version of its moisturizer, formulated for acne-prone skin and free of common irritants. This noncomedogenic moisturizer contains ceramides, hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and squalane to hydrate without clogging pores. Priced affordably, it's designed for sensitive skin and is free of dyes, fragrance, and parabens.

articles.title: Acerpure cordless wet & dry vacuum cleaner review: Is it worth it at ₹17,999?
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: Acer has launched the Acerpure cordless wet & dry vacuum cleaner, a 3-in-1 vacuum priced at ₹17,999. It features a digital display, self-cleaning brush roller, and dual tanks for wet and dry cleaning. The vacuum is designed for small-to-medium homes and offers convenience in daily cleaning.

articles.title: Zong Brings Back the Buzz with MY5
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Zong, a technology innovation company, is promoting its MY5 bundle, a value-for-money communication solution. MY5 allows subscribers to add up to four people and enjoy seamless communication. The service includes exclusive digital services like Golootlo, Waada, and Zong TV through the MY Zong App.

articles.title: Chinese EV brand Nio to be launched in Singapore in first quarter of 2026
articles.author: Lee Nian Tjoe
articles.summary: Nio, a Chinese electric vehicle brand, will launch in Singapore in the first quarter of 2026 through Wearnes Automotive, marking its entry into the Southeast Asian market. The initial model will be the Firefly, a compact electric hatchback, which supports both conventional charging and battery swapping. Nio also plans expansion to Costa Rica and Uzbekistan.

articles.title: 30 Somewhat Random Things To Buy For Your Home That'll Benefit You In The Long Run
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Amazon offers the Amazon Basics Dutch Oven, a cost-effective alternative to Le Creuset, and the Blink Mini 2 smart camera, designed for indoor/outdoor security with motion detection and two-way audio. Stasher provides reusable food bags which are washable and microwave safe. Spacesaver provides jumbo Spacesaver vacuum storage bags that compress bulky items, creating more closet space.

articles.title: Primark's £6 perfumes ‘smell like luxury' in ‘travel friendly' size
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new line of affordable perfumes called PS... Pro Eau de Parfum, available in four scents: Electric Rose, Nomad Oasis, Savanna Breeze, and Soul Reflection. These 30ml perfumes are priced at £6 each. Additionally, Primark offers Sandalwood Runway and Matcha Mood perfumes in 50ml bottles for £8.

articles.title: 37 Cheap Versions Of Expensive Products
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: L'Oreal introduced Lumi Glotion, an illuminating moisturizer, while NYX launched Fat Oil Lip Drip and Brow Glue. Essence released Lash Princess mascara. These products deliver hydration, enhance features, and provide alternatives to higher-end brands, offering consumers affordable options for beauty and skincare.

articles.title: ‘I read my washing machine manual – and it changed the way I wash clothes forever'
articles.author: Lilith Hudson
articles.summary: A study by appliance brand AEG showed that 46% of people rarely consult their washing machine's manual. Malcolm Andre, a product specialist at LG Electronics, says cotton requires longer wash and rinse cycles. He also states that for lightly soiled clothes a cold wash will be most economical.

articles.title: QL Eggs celebrates National Day with Breakathon Carnival, cracking 6,800 eggs
articles.summary: QL Eggs introduced the Brain+ Egg, a new product containing DHA and choline to support brain health. This introduction aligns with QL Eggs' commitment to innovation and providing affordable sources of protein to Malaysians.

articles.title: LG launches appliance subscription service in S'pore for fridges, washing machines, air purifiers & more
articles.author: Tammi Tan
articles.summary: LG launched LG Subscribe, a subscription service for premium appliances and electronics, including refrigerators, washing machines, air purifiers, laptops and TVs. Customers can subscribe and after the end of subscription, the appliance is theirs to keep with no further fees. As part of the LG Careship service, every plan includes expert care visits.

articles.title: Ferragosto, raffica di controlli dei baschi verdi: sequestrati oltre 9.000 articoli contraffatti
articles.author: La Voce Del Trentino
articles.summary: WashCraft is introducing 'WashCraft GO,' a new laundry service business model in Delhi NCR, starting with 50 Electric Vehicles. The new model includes premium dry cleaning, eco-friendly options, and express services. WashCraft aims to extend its reach beyond Delhi NCR and establish a strong foothold in various cities across India by opening additional franchises.

articles.title: Amazon to end this free service for Android users on August 20
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Amazon will discontinue a free service for Android users starting in August.

articles.title: Demand for Washer Dryer Combos on the Rise across seasons as Consumers Turn to Smarter Laundry Routines for Convenience & Performance
articles.author: Sourav
articles.summary: Samsung is experiencing strong consumer interest in its washer dryer combos in India, driven by the demand for space-efficient and multi-functional laundry appliances. These combos offer benefits like protection from dust and germs, efficient use of space, AI-powered fabric care, and faster drying, appealing to young families and millennial homeowners seeking convenience and smart home integration.

articles.title: Ferdi Moolman Appointed as MTN South Africa's New CEO: Leadership Transition Highlights MTN South Africa Announces Leadership Transition with Ferdi Moolman as New CEO; Strategic Focus Aims at Growth a
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: MTN South Africa appointed Ferdi Moolman as its new CEO, signaling a strategic reorientation. The company will focus on Fintech expansion by building on MTN Mobile Money (MoMo), accelerating digital transformation, and exploring new revenue streams like IoT and cloud services. They will invest in network infrastructure to improve service quality and expand 5G deployment.

articles.title: Macaron AI, the World's First Personal Agent, Officially Launches, Ushering in the Era of Experience AI
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: Macaron AI has launched the Personal Agent, an AI product that personalizes and streamlines daily life. This Experience AI analyzes conversations and instantly creates personalized mini-apps based on user preferences and habits.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 5G teaser hints at new AI features ahead of August 20 launch
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 10 5G on August 20, featuring new AI-driven camera capabilities like Super Res Zoom and an 'Add Me' tool for group photos. The launch event will also include the Pixel Watch 4 and affordable Pixel Buds 2a.

articles.title: New Greggs just days away from serving up tasty treats in Falkirk
articles.author: James Trimble
articles.summary: Greggs is opening a new store in Falkirk on August 22. The store is located at Unit 1, Almond Court, in Middlefield Industrial Estate, near The Kelpies and Falkirk Stadium.

articles.title: LG Harnesses the Power of Technology to Bring People Closer This Summer
articles.summary: LG Electronics is spotlighting how its innovative products and campaigns foster emotional connection. LG is launching Radio Optimism, an AI-powered platform that transforms emotions into personalized songs. LG's XBOOM speakers, Tone Free earbuds, LG ThinQ app and OLED TVs also facilitate shared experiences and maintain connections with loved ones.

articles.title: LG unveils signature OLED 8K TV
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched its signature OLED 8K TV (ZX Series). The new TVs deliver real 8K quality.

articles.title: On the 18th, BAT Rothmans' cigarette-type e-cigarette brand Glo released two new products of stick N..
articles.author: Choi Ki-Sung
articles.summary: BAT Rothmans, under its Glo brand, launched two new Neo stick products, "Island Click" and "Blush Click," designed for the HYPER series. "Neo Island Click" offers a tropical flavor upon capsule burst, while "Neo Blush Click" delivers a sweet flavor. Both products feature stick seal technology for hygienic use.

articles.title: Filipino textile leaders weave heritage and innovation at 'Legacy and Dreams'
articles.summary: Classic Characters Inc. and New Creation Manufacturing showcased their products at their annual tradeshow. New Creation Manufacturing reintroduced Hello Dolly's Sanitized babywear line, emphasizing antimicrobial protection. This reintroduction reinforces their commitment to health and hygiene.

articles.title: 「Switch2 ポケモンレジェンズZAセット」の予約開始日が9月5日に決定！
articles.summary: Nintendo is potentially releasing the Nintendo Switch 2. Pokemon LEGENDS Z-A is associated with this release.

articles.title: Twirl Ready: 4 Stylish Skirts from Zalora You'll Love
articles.summary: Zalora introduced new women's skirts collection. The collection includes flirty black skater skirts, earthy brown maxi skirts in linen blend, cream beige bubble skirts, and bold black mini skirts.

articles.title: Elon Musk Says Grok Imagine Will Give Users 'Superhuman Imagination Powers'
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: xAI expands access to Grok Imagine, its AI-powered creativity tool, making it available on Android after an initial iOS release. The tool, designed for generating AI photos and short videos from prompts, offers multiple video creation modes, and has already generated over 44 million images. xAI positions Grok Imagine as a competitor to platforms like OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Gemini.

articles.title: Dyson vacuum with 'unbelievable power' has £100 off in sale
articles.author: Emilia Randall
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the V8 Advanced vacuum for a reduced price of £229.99, a £100 saving. The vacuum features a digital motor providing 10% more suction than previous models, up to 40 minutes of cleaning time, and a filtration system capturing 99.99% of particles. User reviews on the Dyson website show an impressive 4.4 out of 5-star rating.

articles.title: Accenture Song ANZ widens Fabio Buresti's remit
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Accenture Song ANZ has expanded Fabio Buresti's role to managing director of customer strategy, and design and digital products lead. Buresti will integrate design, digital product innovation, and brand strategy across Accenture Song ANZ and Droga5 ANZ. This expansion will involve embedding AI and emerging technologies to enhance brand experiences and creative work.

articles.title: 36 Products With Downright Shocking Results
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Nivea introduced a lightweight gel-cream utilizing Q10 for skin firming and moisturizing. Bounce offers a wrinkle release spray in a travel size. Bissell launched Stomp N' Go stain lifting pads for easy stain removal. Veet released a sensitive hair removal gel formulated with aloe, offering longer-lasting results and reduced irritation.

articles.title: Media Buying Briefing: Havas joins race to find answers to clients' zero-click search queries
articles.author: Digiday
articles.summary: Havas has launched Brand Insights AI, a tool designed to provide advertisers with real-time rankings related to AI search results about their brand. This allows clients to understand and potentially influence what generative AI search tools say about their brands.

articles.title: 47 Skin's 'life-changing' skincare products for spot-prone teens are now 10% off
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: 47 Skin is offering a 10% discount on its top-selling skincare bundles as a back-to-school deal. The bundles, such as the 2-Step Cleanse and Protect Bundle and the 3-Step Moisture Bundle, feature products like daily cleansers, serums, and moisturizers, all designed to address skin problems. The products contain Silver Chitoderm, proven to eliminate blemish-causing bacteria.

articles.title: 50 Alternatives To More Expensive Products You'll Love So Much, You May Shed A Tear
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The market offers various affordable alternatives to popular high-end products from companies like Skims, Lululemon, and Gucci. For example, consumers can find alternatives for a seamless bodycon jumpsuit similar to Skims, longline sports bra, and fanny pack similar to Lululemon's items, and alternatives for the Gucci Dionysus bag and loafers.

articles.title: Kia launches upgraded Carnival minivan with enhanced convenience features
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Kia Corp. released the latest version of a vehicle on Monday.

articles.title: Masterminds Must Have Designed These 39 Problem-Solving Products For Summer
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products, including a thermal phone case that reflects sunlight, a phone umbrella for screen visibility, and a laptop tent to prevent overheating. Additionally, it highlights the Owala FreeSip tumbler, featuring triple-layer insulation and a unique spout design, along with Arm & Hammer deodorizers for eliminating unwanted odors, and reusable water balloons for fun without cleanup.

articles.title: The Ninja Swirl by Creami has landed in Oz — here's where to get the viral soft serve maker
articles.author: Tom's Guide
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Ninja CREAMi Swirl in Australia, following its success in the US. The CREAMi Swirl includes a handle for soft serve and offers six soft serve modes and 13 one-touch programs. This new product brings an ice cream shop experience to the user's kitchen.

articles.title: More than 8,000 shoppers join waitlist for frozen dessert kitchen gadget TikTok can't get enough of
articles.author: Sophie Haslett
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the CREAMi Swirl in Australia on August 18. This kitchen gadget allows users to transform ingredients into ice cream and soft serve with enhanced Creamify technology, featuring 13 one-touch programs and a Soft Serve Handle. The device retails for $549.99.

articles.title: Airtel adopts WhatsApp chatbot to enhance customer experience
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: Airtel Nigeria has launched Airtel Assist, a WhatsApp-based self-service chatbot, to improve customer service. The chatbot allows subscribers to manage their accounts, buy airtime/data, make payments, and troubleshoot issues directly within WhatsApp, offering 24/7 support.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro May Come With a 6.27-inch Screen, 4,300mAh Battery
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to update its Galaxy S series in 2026 with a new model. This new model, known as Galaxy S26 Pro, is expected to replace the Galaxy S26 Plus.

articles.title: Is L'Oréal's Collagen Moisture Filler worth it? I tried It on dry, sensitive skin
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: L'Oréal Paris introduces new beauty products aimed at providing hydration, plumpness, and soothing for sensitive, dry skin. The products are being reviewed for their effectiveness.

articles.title: Samsung unleashes its biggest ever Neo QLED TV with a five-figure asking fee that's actually competitive
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Samsung's Neo QLED TV features a massive 115-inch screen and Samsung's NQ8 Ai Gen3 processor.

articles.title: Samsung's New Galaxy Buds 3 FE Cost $100 Less Than the Flagship Galaxy Buds 3 Pro
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Buds 3 FE for $150. The Galaxy Buds 3 FE resemble the Galaxy Buds 3 Pro but have fewer features and different drivers.

articles.title: Iowa firm buys New Hope Hy-Vee store for $18.35M
articles.author: Finance
articles.summary: ExchangeRight acquired New Hope Hy-Vee. This purchase represents an expansion of ExchangeRight's portfolio and potentially new service offerings or product changes at the New Hope Hy-Vee location.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 5G review: Sleek, compact, and beyond the hype
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the Galaxy Z Flip 7, a foldable smartphone designed to feel like a traditional phone while making a bold statement. It is described as sleek, portable, and sturdy, targeting the premium segment.

articles.title: McLeod Software's New Release Reimagines the User Experience, offering Flexibility, Real-Time Insights, Streamlined Back Office Tools
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: McLeod delivers smarter planning, faster invoicing, and AI-driven communication with its updated product. This release focuses on faster performance, greater power, and a refreshingly intuitive feel.

articles.title: DraftKings NFL Sunday Ticket Promo Scores $400 in Total Bonus Value
articles.author: Sportingnews
articles.summary: DraftKings is offering a new NFL Sunday Ticket promotion for the regular season. New customers can sign up to receive bonus bets and stream out-of-market games as part of the welcome offer.

articles.title: 60 Seconds Sharp Launches as the First-to-Market Blade Sharpener That Works in Under a Minute ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: 60 Seconds Sharp officially launched, providing homeowners with a tool to sharpen lawnmower blades in under sixty seconds without removal. This product is the first of its kind in the market.

articles.title: 16-field baseball/softball project in Cedar Park gets new timeline
articles.author: Sam Schaffer
articles.summary: Snarf's Sandwiches is now offering its sub sandwiches in far Northwest Austin. This expands the availability of their existing product line to a new geographic area.
